title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: self-host large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; streaming & synchronous calls, Android friendly.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; generate, chat, pull models.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat, manage models.

title: ollama-copilot (VS Code)
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama generators & embedders; build RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming chat, embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama API; async/tokio, typed requests/responses.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks for Ollama + Open WebUI, GPU or CPU.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A & summarization.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin integrating Ollama for block-level AI assistance.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Template repo: FastAPI + Ollama + Chroma for turnkey local RAG APIs.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot front-end for Ollama; group & private chats, streaming replies.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands.
